block.p: COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE--Suspended Boston Red Sox RHP Pedro Martinez for five games and fined him an undisclosed amount for hitting Cleveland Indians 2B Roberto Alomar with a pitch during an April 30 game. Fined Cleveland RHP Charles Nagy an undisclosed amount for hitting Boston 2B Jose Offerman in the same game.

COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE--Suspended Boston Red Sox RHP Pedro Martinez for five games and fined him an undisclosed amount for hitting Cleveland Indians 2B Roberto Alomar with a pitch during an April 30 game. Fined Cleveland RHP Charles Nagy an undisclosed amount for hitting Boston 2B Jose Offerman in the same game.

BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed 1B Will Clark on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled 3B Ryan Minor from Rochester of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Recalled OF Jose Macias from Toledo of the International League. Optioned RHP Dave Borkowski to Toledo. TEXAS RANGERS--Signed INF Scott Livingstone to a contract with Oklahoma of the American Association.

MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Recalled LHP Horacio Estrada from Indianapolis of the International League. Optioned LHP Ray King to Indianapolis. Returned LHP Matt Williams, chosen in the Rule 5 draft, to the New York Yankees. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Agreed to terms with 2B Fernando Vina on a contract extension through 2003.

CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed OL Mike Guilliams, WR Jeff Klopf, LB Caspor Stiles and FB Nick Sudano. DALLAS COWBOYS--Signed LB Joe Bowden. Waived CB James Brayboy. NEW YORK GIANTS--Signed FB Dawud Rasheed and WR-KR Kevin Prentiss. NEW YORK JETS--Re-signed LB Mo Lewis to a one-year contract.
COLUMBUS CREW--Traded a 2001 second-round draft pick to New York-New Jersey for MF-F Miles Joseph.
